languages.text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} uses an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that grants {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} to the target, the Officer also gains half that number of movement points.
languages.original_text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}офицер{/g}, применяя {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g}, предоставляет цели {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}очки передвижения{/g}, то сам он тоже получает половину от этого числа очков передвижения.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the Leader's ability moves any target, the Leader gains movement points equal to half the distance the target moved. If this happens on another character's turn, the Leader will gain these movement points on their next turn.

Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} uses an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that grants {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} to the target, the Officer also gains half that number of movement points.

Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} uses an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that grants {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} to the target, the Officer also gains half that number of movement points.

Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} moves any target, the Officer gains {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} equal to half the distance the target moved. If this happens on another character's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the Officer will gain these movement points on their next turn.

languages.text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}офицер{/g}, применяя {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g}, предоставляет цели {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}очки передвижения{/g}, то сам он тоже получает половину от этого числа очков передвижения.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} uses their {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} granting {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} to the target, the Officer also gains half of that number of movement points.

traits.locale_text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}офицер{/g}, применяя {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g}, предоставляет цели {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}очки передвижения{/g}, то сам он тоже получает половину от этого числа очков передвижения.

Когда лидер, применяя способность, перемещает любую цель, он получает ОП в количестве, равном половине расстояния, которое преодолела цель. Если это произошло в ход другого персонажа, лидер получит ОП на следующий ход.

Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}офицер{/g}, применяя {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g}, предоставляет цели {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}очки передвижения{/g}, то сам он тоже получает половину от этого числа очков передвижения.

languages.text: 每当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}军官{/g}使用{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力，{/g}赋予目标{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}时，军官本身也会获得移动点数，等同于目标获得移动点数的一半。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} uses an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that grants {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} to the target, the Officer also gains half that number of movement points.

traits.locale_text: 每当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}军官{/g}使用{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力，{/g}赋予目标{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}时，军官本身也会获得移动点数，等同于目标获得移动点数的一半。

languages.text: Cuando el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}oficial{/g} usa una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} que otorga {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}puntos de movimiento{/g} al objetivo, el oficial también gana la mitad de esos puntos de movimiento.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} uses an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that grants {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} to the target, the Officer also gains half that number of movement points.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}oficial{/g} usa una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} que otorga {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}puntos de movimiento{/g} al objetivo, el oficial también gana la mitad de esos puntos de movimiento.

languages.text: Wenn die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Offiziers{/g} ein beliebiges Ziel bewegt, erhält der Offizier {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}Bewegungspunkte{/g} in Höhe der halben Distanz, die sich das Ziel bewegt hat. Geschieht dies im {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} eines anderen Charakters, erhält der Offizier diese Bewegungspunkte in seinem nächsten Zug.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} moves any target, the Officer gains {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} equal to half the distance the target moved. If this happens on another character's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the Officer will gain these movement points on their next turn.

traits.locale_text: Wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Offizier{/g} eine {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} einsetzt, die dem Ziel {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}Bewegungspunkte{/g} gewährt, erhält der Offizier selbst auch die Hälfte dieser Bewegungspunkte.

languages.text: Lorsque l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}officier{/g} utilise une {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} conférant des {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}points de déplacement{/g} à la cible, il gagne à son tour la moitié du nombre de points de déplacement ainsi octroyés.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} uses an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that grants {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} to the target, the Officer also gains half that number of movement points.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}officier{/g} utilise une {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} conférant des {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}points de déplacement{/g} à la cible, il gagne à son tour la moitié du nombre de points de déplacement ainsi octroyés.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}士官{/g}がターゲットに{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移動ポイント{/g}を付与する{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を使用すると、士官自身も移動ポイントの半分を獲得する。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} uses an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that grants {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} to the target, the Officer also gains half that number of movement points.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}士官{/g}がターゲットに{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移動ポイント{/g}を付与する{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を使用すると、士官自身も移動ポイントの半分を獲得する。

languages.text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} gives {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} to any target, the Officer gains half of the amount themself.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} gives {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} to any target, the Officer gains half of the amount themself.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Subay{/g}, hedefe {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}hareket puanı{/g} kazandıran bir {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g} kullandığında Subay da bu hareket puanlarının yarısını kazanır.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} uses an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that grants {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} to the target, the Officer also gains half that number of movement points.
